attributes.action: stop benefits for people who can work but can't be bothered
attributes.additional_details: because our tax is getting higher and higher. and the people who can't be bothered to work get money for nothing from the tax payers
attributes.background: stop giving out money to people who can't be bothered to work. and give it to those who need it.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
